Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

After Beast Machine, what do you imagine
the Transformer universe to be? 

  o Everyone gets TO'd and all are happy yay. 
  o It's a big mess because not everyone is happy to be TO. 
  o The TFs not on Cybertron mount against the others. 
  o Megatron left something behind... 
  o It's still Preds vs Maxies, but with many subgroups. 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/surveys?id=1069272  

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
